connectDevice: While not having the {{name}} board powered, connect your system to the board's DBG/PRG port via a micro-USB cable.
Note: for the {{name}} v1.1, only power the board from the PRG port for flashing. For the {{name}} v1.0, power on the board by attaching power to either the Barrel or the Phoenix connector.
disconnectDevice: Power off the {{name}} by detaching the power if connected and unplug the DGB micro-USB cable.
bootDevice: Remove and re-connect power to the {{name}}
